contest-event.event-date:
July 7, 1906 D Pontypridd Contest (Class C)
Pontypridd Contest (Class C) 30 Test Piece Contest Pontypridd Contest pontypridd-contest-class-c
Songs of Balfe
Pontypridd, Rhondda Cynon Taf, Wales, UK 1st prize £7, 2nd prize £4, 3rd prize £2, 4th prize £1. March contest 1st (£1) Aberdare, 2nd (10s.6d.) Lewis Merthyr. 7 bands competed.
March 7, 2012, 4:51 p.m. Sept. 14, 2018, 10:49 a.m.
1 Aberdare Town Jesse Manley
2 Nantymoel Town Prize Band William Smith
3 Mountain Ash Hibernian Thomas Griffiths
4 Lewis Merthyr Band J. Locker
Unknown Result Dinas George Hawkins
Unknown Result Albion Colliery Gus Foxall
Unknown Result New Tredegar J. Bottomley
